siteDescription: Dopex is a maximum liquidity and minimal exposure options protocol

0.name: SSOV Options
0.paragraph: Provide option liquidity via covered calls or cash-secured puts while passively earning diverse sources of yields.

1.name: Liquidity Pools
1.paragraph: A platform for option buyers to easily exit & sell their tokenized positions at any time at a discounted rate.

2.name: Atlantic Options
2.paragraph: A novel DeFi primitive that aims to improve collateral composability & efficiency by enabling buyers to borrow option collateral.

body.paragraph: We built a protocol with vast improvements over the existing options market.

0.heading: Staking Yield
0.paragraph: Your collateral never goes un-used and is put to work by staking in other protocols to earn yields.

1.heading: Collateral Borrowing
1.paragraph: Atlantic options offer buyers with unique products like applying straddle strategies with a fraction of the cost and insuring leveraged longs.

2.heading: Minimize Risk
2.paragraph: Offset risk and minimize losses as a liquidity provider with rDPX rebates.

3.heading: Pricing Efficiency
3.paragraph: Our options collateral efficiency gives Dopex a distinct advantage in pricing, allowing for immediate arbitrage opportunities.

tokenModel.paragraph: Dopex utilizes two separate tokens to coordinate new ecosystem dynamics in a synergistic feedback loop.

dpx.description: DPX is the limited supply governance token.
dpx.paragraph: It accrues fees and revenue from pools, vaults and wrappers.

rdpx.description: rDPX is the rebate token for option writers.
rdpx.paragraph: A ton of other utility will be introduced for rDPX
